      • randInt

        public static int randInt(java.util.Random rand,
                          int min,
                          int max)
        Returns a psuedo-random number between min and max, inclusive. The difference between min and max can be at most Integer.MAX_VALUE - 1.
        Parameters:
        min - Minimim value
        max - Maximim value. Must be greater than min.
        Returns:
        Integer between min and max, inclusive.
        See Also:
        Random.nextInt(int)
